pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Boosted Tweedie Compound Poisson Model // An implementation of a boosted Tweedie compound Poisson model proposed by Yang, Y., Qian, W. and Zou, H. (2018) doi:10.1080/07350015.2016.1200981. It is capable of fitting a flexible nonlinear Tweedie compound Poisson model (or a gamma model) and capturing high-order interactions among predictors. This package is based on the 'gbm' package originally developed by Greg Ridgeway.
